comments.author: Martijn van Groningen
comments.body:
Initial patch containing a implementation for bytes sorted. Random test fails for now...

I think bytes sorted is the only impl that makes since other implementations don't work with ordinals and thus would be much slower.

comments.author: Martijn van Groningen
comments.body: Updated patch. Random test passes now. Need to add some more jdocs and remove some duplicate code and then it should be ready.

comments.author: Martijn van Groningen
comments.body: Some code refactorings and added some more jdocs.

description: Create docvalues based grouped facet collector. Currently only term based collectors have been implemented (LUCENE-3802).
summary: Create docvalues based grouped facet collector
